oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Women's Suffrage Portrait
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: portraits; suffrage;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The portrait shows a group of women, each wearing a badge of some sort. Given the nature of the J.B. Mann Suffrage collection it seems likely that this group of women was involved in some sort of suffrage activity.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Collection donated by June Beasley Mann; Collection processed by Laura Fogarty
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: The J. B. Mann Suffrage Collection
